alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Jackson, Harmon, south central Greer, northwestern Foard and western Hardeman Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Wellington to near Childress to 4 miles south of Cee Vee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quanah, Hollis, Eldorado, Gould, Goodlett, Duke, McKnight, McQueen, and Lazare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
